ValidationRule.description: Early Pay Tiers can be deleted, but values cannot be edited.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Election__c,'Weekly Billing/14 Day Payment - 8 basis points (0.08%)') && OR( SBQQ__LowerBound__c <> 6, SBQQ__UpperBound__c <> 8, Basis_Points__c <> 8 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Early Pay Tiers can be deleted, but values cannot be edited.
